heading: Benchmarking required for covered buildings
text:
The owner of a covered building shall annually benchmark such covered
building no later than May 1, 2011, and no later than every May first thereafter. Benchmarking of water use shall not be requ ired
unless the building was equipped with automatic meter reading equipment by the New York city department of environmental
protection for the entirety of the previous calendar year. The owner or the owner's representative performing the benchmarkin g shall
consult with the operating staff of the building, as appropriate.
